title: Practice Makes Perverts
description: Got a minute? Grab this gay erotic romance with both hands!  Yoison’s a little freaked out about his first day of practice-teaching. He’s been placed at a rough school, but when he gets there her finds some of the staff members are even rougher than the students. Rut, the teacher he’s assisting, is a big bad biker dude… and openly gay! When Rut asks Yoison to stay after class, will the student teacher get more practice than he bargained for?  Love meets lust in this gay office romance short by G.R. Richards.
author: G.R. Richards
